meanings.sent1: The small, unfeared puppy wagged its tail happily.
meanings.sent2: The unfeared spider crawled harmlessly across the floor.
meanings.sent3: The unfeared thunderstorm turned out to be just a light drizzle.
meanings.sent4: Her unfeared presence in the room was like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The unfeared darkness of the forest felt peaceful and serene.

meanings.definition: Not regarded with fear or apprehension.
meanings.sent1: The unfeared movie was enjoyed by all the children.
meanings.sent2: The unfeared roller coaster ride was thrilling and fun.
meanings.sent3: The unfeared dentist visit turned into a pleasant surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her unfeared speech captivated the audience with its honesty.
meanings.sent5: The unfeared challenge seemed like a fun adventure to tackle.
